name: 3RD EYE (itch)
description:
Welcome to 3RD EYE, a game where concepts are alive and in danger, and they picked YOU to save them !

This game is a prototype but can still be completed.

Don't hesitate to share your feelings and feedbacks about it !

Team :
Ewen "OXY" LE MOAL : Narrative Designer, Creative Director
Andy REMY : Code
Laura BETTINI : Game Artist (https://dreamiiiiie.itch.io/)
Andrea DI MARZIO : Game Artist
Cameron SWALES : 3D Artist
